name: Slippery Flow
description:
Caution!! Street floor is wet and gangs are comming!

Slippery man will kick their ass! Nobody in a wet street with Slippery man on charge!!

How much guys can you slip before you die?

Play on WEB here:
http://www.timemachineapps.com/jams/slippery-flow/

Controls

Gamepad:

A or B
Punch (Weak attack)
X or Y
Kick (Strong attack)
Left Stick
Move
DpadMove

Keyboard:

Space
Punch (Weak attack)
Control
Kick (Strong attack)
WASDMove
ArrowsMove
Tools:
  • Unity
  • Ecrettmusic Webpage
  • Pyxel Edit
  • Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html
